xuiHighlight
filter in module xui

Description

Filter used for highlighting part of the plain text in a search and returns HTML. It is recommended to be used with the ng-bind-html directive.

Usage

In HTML Template Binding

{{ xuiHighlight_expression | xuiHighlight:searchTerm }}

In JavaScript

$filter('xuiHighlight')(text, searchTerm)

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
textstring

The source text.

searchTermstring

The search term to be highlighted.
